patthana2.3:1.1_0: Āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—kāmāsavaṁ paṭicca diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavo, diṭṭhāsavaṁ paṭicca kāmāsavo avijjāsavo, avijjāsavaṁ paṭicca kāmāsavo diṭṭhāsavo, bhavāsavaṁ paṭicca avijjāsavo, diṭṭhāsavaṁ paṭicca avijjāsavo.

patthana2.3:83.1_0: Noāsavo dhammo āsavassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—noāsavā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ āsavānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.3:85.1_0: Noāsavo dhammo noāsavassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.3:85.1_1: ekaṁ, āhārapaccayena paccayo—noāsavā āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.3:86.1_0: Noāsavo dhammo āsavassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—noāsavā āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ āsavānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.3:87.1_0: Noāsavo dhammo āsavassa ca noāsavassa ca dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo— noāsavā āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ āsavānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.3:88.1_0: Noāsavo dhammo noāsavassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—noāsavā indriyā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.3:89.1_0: Āsavo dhammo noāsavassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.3:90.1_0: Noāsavo dhammo noāsavassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.3:90.1_3: khandhā vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo, vatthu khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.3:90.1_7: **Pacchājātā**—noāsavā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.3:91.1_0: Noāsavo dhammo āsavassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.3:92.1_0: Noāsavo dhammo āsavassa ca noāsavassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.3:93.1_0: Āsavo ca noāsavo ca dhammā noāsavassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.3:93.1_1: **Sahajātā**—āsavā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.3:93.1_2: **Pacchājātā**—āsavā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.3:94.1_0: Āsavo dhammo āsavassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—kāmāsavo diṭṭhāsavassa avijjāsavassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (Cakkaṁ.)
patthana2.3:95.1_0: Āsavo dhammo noāsavassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.3:95.1_1: **Sahajātā**—āsavā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.3:96.1_0: Āsavo dhammo āsavassa ca noāsavassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— kāmāsavo diṭṭhāsavassa avijjāsavassa sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo. (Cakkaṁ.)
patthana2.3:97.1_0: Noāsavo dhammo noāsavassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.3:97.1_6: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.3:97.1_12: **Pacchājātā**—noāsavā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.3:98.1_3: vatthuṁ assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha āsavā uppajjanti, vatthu āsavānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.3:99.1_0: Noāsavo dhammo āsavassa ca noāsavassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.3:99.1_1: **Sahajāto**—noāsavo eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ āsavānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.3:100.1_0: Āsavo ca noāsavo ca dhammā āsavassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.3:100.1_1: **Sahajāto**—kāmāsavo ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā diṭṭhāsavassa avijjāsavassa atthipaccayena paccayo (cakkaṁ).
patthana2.3:100.1_2: Kāmāsavo ca vatthu ca diṭṭhāsavassa avijjāsavassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (Cakkaṁ.)
patthana2.3:101.1_0: Āsavo ca noāsavo ca dhammā noāsavassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.3:101.1_1: **Sahajāto**—noāsavo eko khandho ca āsavā ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.3:101.1_2: **Sahajātā**—āsavā mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.3:101.1_3: āsavā ca vatthu ca noāsavānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.3:101.1_4: **Pacchājātā**—āsavā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.3:102.1_0: Āsavo ca noāsavo ca dhammā āsavassa ca noāsavassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.3:102.1_1: **Sahajāto**—noāsavo eko khandho ca kāmāsavo ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ diṭṭhāsavassa avijjāsavassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…

patthana2.3:118.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (anulomapadā paripuṇṇā), avigate nava.

patthana2.3:275.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
